scripts.regenerate-all-images: cd .. && node scripts/generate-images.mjs --image-size 24 && node scripts/generate-images.mjs --image-size 24 --transparent && node scripts/generate-images.mjs --image-size 192 && node scripts/generate-images.mjs --image-size 192 --transparent && node scripts/generate-images.mjs --image-size 480 && node scripts/generate-images.mjs --image-size 480 --transparent
